p: MTT assay was used to evaluate the effect of M. splendens essential oil and its main compounds, α-bisabolol and trans-nerolidol, on the cell viability of A549 (human lung cancer), MCF-7 (human breast adenocarcinoma) tumor lines and HaCaT (human keratinocytes) normal cells, as the reference to assess overall cytotoxic activity. All results showed ( Figure 1) a dose-dependent inhibition of cell growth and, in particular, α-bisabolol was the most active component against the three studied cell lines, in the dilutions ranging from 1 to 200 µg/mL.
